I was in Mexico last year and visited coba Mayan . The tour guide explained he was Mayan descent and he shared the Same look of a traditional Mayan man "no facial hair, short and big head" his words not mine. I asked him directly this question and he was stumped! All he said was "the Spanish arrived and all hell broke loose!
Did you Mayan party ever have conflict with the Spanish? Or was it a quick surrender? It's something that has not been covered in media as far as I can see
I truly was not expecting a great response, so, thank you!
